alert.note: Alert for Beckham; Blaine; Custer; Dewey; Roger Mills (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 31 at 6:01PM CDT until May 31 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Roger Mills County in western Oklahoma... Custer County in western Oklahoma... Southwestern Blaine County in northwestern Oklahoma... Southeastern Dewey County in northwestern Oklahoma... Northeastern Beckham County in western Oklahoma... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 601 PM CDT, multiple severe thunderstorms were located near Foss Reservoir, Stafford, and Custer City, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Weatherford, Clinton, Thomas, Hydro, Arapaho, Hammon, Custer City, Butler, Foss Reservoir, Fay and Stafford. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Beckham; Blaine; Custer; Dewey; Roger Mills
